00045 class DccChatThread : public DccThread
00046 {
00047 public:
00048         DccChatThread(KviWindow * wnd,kvi_socket_t fd);
00049         ~DccChatThread();
00050 protected:
00051         KviPointerList<KviDataBuffer>    * m_pOutBuffers;
00052 protected:
00053         virtual void run();
00054         bool tryFlushOutBuffers();
00055         // This should handle the incoming data buffer
00056         // must "eat" some data from data.buffer, memmove the remaining part
00057         // to the beginning, kvi_realloc data.buffer and update data.iLen
00058         // If bCritical is true, it should handle the whole data buffer
00059         // since the thread is going to die
00060         // It should return true if the handing was succesfull
00061         // or false if the thread should be stopped
00062         virtual bool handleIncomingData(KviDccThreadIncomingData *data,bool bCritical);
00063 public:
00064         virtual void sendRawData(const void * buffer,int len); // mutex (m_pOutBuffers usage)
00065 };
